entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 40.17

[shortdesc]

3M Heat Shrink Flexible Polyolefin Tubing, EPS-200, black, 1 1/2 in x 48 in (3.81 cm x 121.92 cm)

  • 3M™ Heat Shrink Flexible Polyolefin Tubing EPS-200 is 2:1 thin-wall tubing that helps provide convenient protection of electronic components, wire splices or bundling of wires.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • 2:1 shrink ratio
  • When freely recovered, the tubing will shrink to 50% of its original diameter
  • Rated for operation at –55°C (–67°F) to 110°C (230°F)
  • Adhesive reflow will occur at temperatures above 80°C (176°F)
    		•

entry.title: 3M EPS300-1-1/2-BK-48 - 3M Heat Shrink Thin-Wall Flexible Polyolefin Adhesive-Lined Tubing, EPS-300, black, 1 1/2 in x 48 in (3.81 cm x 121.92 cm) EPS300-1-1/2-BK-48 7000133586
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 52.82

[shortdesc]

3M Heat Shrink Thin-Wall Flexible Polyolefin Adhesive-Lined Tubing, EPS-300, black, 1 1/2 in x 48 in (3.81 cm x 121.92 cm)

  • 3M™ Heat Shrink Thin-Wall Flexible Polyolefin Adhesive-Lined Tubing EPS-300 is a 3:1 thin-wall tubing that offers the advantages of integral, adhesive-lined construction.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • 3:1 shrink ratio
  • When freely recovered, the tubing will shrink 33% of its as-supplied diameter
  • The recovered wall thickness of the tubing is proportional to the degree of recovery
  • Operating temperature range is from 55°C (-67°F) to 110°C (230°F), with a shrinking temperature minimum of 121°C (250°F)
    		•
